name: Dell PowerProtect Data Manager Reporting转义不当漏洞
product: ["DELL PowerProtect Data Manager Reporting 19.17", "DELL PowerProtect Data Manager Reporting 19.18"]
description: Dell PowerProtect Data Manager Reporting是一款数据保护管理软件。Dell PowerProtect Data Manager Reporting存在转义不当漏洞，该漏洞源于程序未能正确处理输出，目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://www.dell.com/support/kbdoc/en-us/000311083/dsa-2025-062-security-update-for-dell-powerprotect-data-manager-multiple-security-vulnerabilities
patch: Dell PowerProtect Data Manager Reporting转义不当漏洞的补丁
